original_title: Bing And His Friends At The Cinema!
overview: Come and join Bing and His Friends… at the cinema! Let’s watch some favourite Bing stories! We’ll help Pico with her new Bing puzzle! We’ll also play MATCH with the Rainbow Fairy Mice and… we’ll help Hoppity fly home and… we’ll find Bing’s missing speedy cars!
title: Bing And His Friends At The Cinema!
